title: Roasted Turmeric Cauliflower
directions: Place cauliflower into a baking dish. Add olive oil, turmeric, cumin, and salt then mix together.
Cover baking dish with foil to keep florets from drying out and roast for about 35-40 minutes.
Then, remove foil and cook for another 15 minutes.

My Recommendation: While the recipe uses olive oil, I recommend coconut oil instead. Olive oil is susceptible to oxidation when heated and should only be used cold, whereas coconut oil is stable enough to resist heat-induced damage.
